import React from 'react' import HomeScreen from './HomeScreen' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' function Borrow() { const bookId = localStorage.getItem('bookId'); const [book, setBook] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3033/book/' + bookId) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) setBook(data) }) }, []) return (
{book.map(book => ( ))}
Id Title Category Quantity
{book.ID} {book.Name} {book.Categories} {book.Amount}
) } export default Borrow
